# Table constructor

Constructor that builds a new Table not belonging to a [`DataCollection`](../DataCollection.md).

```csharp
public Table(string name)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| name | The name of the new Table |

## Remarks

If a Table belonging to a [`DataCollection`](../DataCollection.md) is needed, use the method [`DataCollection.AddTable(string)`](../DataCollection/AddTable.md) to create one, instead of calling directly this Constructor.
